post_content:
This is what these days unemployed engineers do not try !

AIML engineers are best sought after people but they don't have to think only of the industrial AI which is a killer of many employments.

They should think of AI that creates jobs and Augments human mind with its leverage that can do wonder to kill the pain points of those who suffer .

Try ,try and try , with dedication,decisiveness, grit , confidence,practice, belief in oneself, can do thought and believe it or not you will be successful where no one can claim it.

It's you and your yourself !

Only you can experience the fathom of joy that no one can !

Do not give up dear young friends !
